a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of women in top income groups, UK
Percentage of individuals falling into top income brackets that are women. Figures relate to total income before tax,
including earned, investment and self-employment income.
Data source: Atkinson, Casarico and Voitchovsky (2018)
Note: The income concept in general does not include capital gains, but the degree to which this holds varies between countries.
